body.p: Why is it that you don’t have to work but still get paid? I could do with a job like that myself. Here I am slaving away day after day while you are fishing.

Last night Joan Hart (Billy’s teacher) & I went to see “Butterfield 8.” The man at the show asked me if I was 18. (I guess they would never let you in) It was a pretty good show but definitely not for you young age.
I hope you can read this but after a day of writing I get sloppy.
To-morrow night there is a tea after school for the Jersey & Keswick teachers. I doubt if they will even bother to come (Keswick I mean) they
don’t seem to appreciate us. I heard a rumour that Gail Pollock will be teaching at our school next. I don’t know how we could even be so lucky!

So you are cooking up wild and wicked plans with Jerry! No seriously it does sound like fun. Look I’ve been thinking why don’t you ask Jerry & his girlfriend to come up the next time you are home. (provide this is convenient for you of course.) If they came up on a Sunday afternoon they could see your Go-Karts and then we could all have super

at my place. Of course we would eat in the dining room & the rest of the family (if they were home) would eat in the kitchen. I have been busy entertaining this week & mom doesn’t mind at all. Let me know about this when you write. (I would try to be a charming hostess- haha.)
Will you be coming home next week or are you planning on staying there forever? It seems like you have really been gone a long time. Do you think so?
Well I just finished making up a English grammar exam. Our exams start on the 8th. I have still Health,
Science & arithmetic to make up so I’ll be busy on the week-end.
I guess you won’t be able to say I didn’t write to you often enough this time dear but I just seem to want to talk to you all the time.
Oh by the way it was about time you asked about the kid, I was wondering whether you were forgetting your duty as devoted father or not.
I am glad you are resting up while you are away because you sure didn’t get much rest at home last time, with me bugging you to take me out every night. Right?
Well I must get some work ready for to-morrow & then go to bed, So goodnight Sweetheart (over)
XXXXXXXX Here’s hoping they won’t be paper ones much longer.
P.S. How did the boys like the pictures of me? I suppose that was just the way you told them I looked.
Je Vous Aime I hope you understand French.
